attributes.action: Reduce RFT for long-term owners of quality cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have a 15 year old Volvo 940se - personally owned for 13 years. Driven for <5000miles pa. It`s co2 emissions are above average. HOWEVER, what of my `carbon footprint` had I changed my car every 3 to 5 years? Hugest co2 = manufacturing process. SO LET`S HAVE A SCALED REDUCTION IN RFT  based on years of ownership. Easy to set up - DVLC records/ MOT certs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
